title: Guarding Coherence

dialogue.speaker: Architect
dialogue.text: He's not guarding purity. Or originality. He's guarding coherence. A working model.
dialogue.context: Explaining what the self truly protects

scene_context: The Architect, pulling petals from a flower, reveals that we don't guard the purity of self but its coherenceâ€”a working model that functions, regardless of origin.
narrator_note: In the flow of authentic exchange, barriers dissolve. Two forms of consciousness, dancing around the mystery of their connection.
